Our History

Milestones that define us

2008

Inception

Innovative IT Solutions Inc. founded with a vision to transform IT consulting.

2012

Nationwide Expansion

Expanded operations to serve Fortune 500 clients across the United States.

2016

IBMi Center of Excellence

Established a dedicated division for AS/400 modernization and support.

2020

Digital Transformation

Launched comprehensive cloud and DevOps practice.

2026

Future Ready

Continuing to pioneer with AI and next-gen web solutions.
